h1_title: Things Black Myth Wukong Doesn't Tell You
content: You’ll come across your fair share of NPCs in Black Myth: Wukong, and it pays to talk to them! Skipping these conversations (and some cases side quests) can be the difference between getting hold of key items and crafting abilities or not. Speak to NPCs sooner rather than later to unlock the chance to increase your Gourd’s healing abilities, craft Medicines, and more.

The content is as follows:
You’ll come across your fair share of NPCs in Black Myth: Wukong, and it pays to talk to them! Skipping these conversations (and some cases side quests) can be the difference between getting hold of key items and crafting abilities or not. Speak to NPCs sooner rather than later to unlock the chance to increase your Gourd’s healing abilities, craft Medicines, and more.
